hits.title: Speed Leggings
hits.description:
RUN WITH IT


Your run requires enduring comfort and support, so step out and hit the road in Speed. Made with zero-distractions and lightweight, ventilating fabrics that move with you, you can trust in Speed no matter how far you go.



- Full length legging
- High-waisted
- Compressive fit
- Internal adjustable elastic/drawcord at front waistband
- Pocket to back of waistband
- Reflective Gymshark sharkhead logo to ankle
- Main: 88% Polyester 12% Elastane. Internal Mesh: 76% Nylon 24% Elastane
- We've cut down our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one
- Model is 5'3" and wears a size M
- SKU: B3A3E-UBCY

hits.title: Adapt Animal Seamless Leggings
hits.description:
WORKOUT ON THE WILD SIDE


The collection made for lifting, unleash your wild side in Adapt Animal. Sweat-wicking finishing, seamless stretch fabric and zero-distraction designs lets you lift in comfort and support every day, in every way.


- High waisted fit
- All-over hybrid animal jacquard
- Ruched detail to bum
- Sweat-wicking finishing
- Elongated ribbed waistband
- Printed logo to upper left hip
- 79% Nylon, 15% Polyester, 6% Elastane
- We’ve cut down our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one
- Model is 5'7" and wears a size XS
- SKU: B2A2W-EBJZ

hits.title: Pulse Mesh Leggings
hits.description:
PUT THE FUN INTO FUNCTIONALITY


When a day is as busy as yours, you need your 'fits to work for you. Pulse has your back through every step, with breathable mesh panels to keep you cool, functional pockets to keep your essentials close, and bright colour pops to match that team energy.



NOTE: Due to the nature of these leggings, they may appear slightly sheer when stretched. We recommend wearing nude underwear with this colour!


- High waisted fit
- Smart envelope style overlap pockets for secure storage
- Mesh panelling for breathability
- Curved underbum seam
- Double-lined back bum panel to help with sheerness
- Pockets to back waistband
- Shaped ankle hem
- Main: 88% Polyester 12% Elastane. Mesh: 100% Polyester
- We've cut down on our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one
- Model is 5’3” and wears a size XS
- SKU: B2A3S-WBBM

hits.title: Adapt Camo Seamless Leggings
hits.description:
FEEL GOOD, PERFORM BETTER


Make any workout possible in the Adapt Camo Seamless Leggings. A camo jacquard meets our signature seamless fabric to make these leggings your ultimate workout partner. Complete with a supportive high waisted fit and sweat-wicking tech to keep you dry and cool during the sweatiest sessions: your next lifting workout is ready for you.


- High waisted fit
- Ruched detailing to bum
- Heatseal branding to hip
- All-over camo jacquard
- Seamless fabric
- Sweat-wicking finishing
- 82% Nylon 13% Polyester 5% Elastane
- We've cut down on our use of swing tags, so this product comes without one
- Model is 5'8" and wears a size XS
- Video model is 5’5” and wears a size XS​
- SKU: B1A2K-NBC3

hits.title: Vital Seamless 2.0 Leggings
hits.description:
DO IT ALL IN VITAL


You can do it all, and so can the Vital Seamless 2.0 Leggings, whether you’re training, resting, or taking your morning walk. A seamless design with figure-contouring shading means comfort and confidence from workout to time out, while the sweat-wicking tech and breathable marl mesh dots keep you cool and dry on the days you’re moving more. Mix and match with a Vital Seamless 2.0 top, and you’re fully prepped to do it all.



This product is made using dope dyeing technology that uses less water, energy and chemicals, as part of our sustainability strategy to lower environmental impact. Find out more here.


- High-waisted fit
- Supportive ribbed waistband
- Figure-contouring shading
- Sweat-wicking tech
- Breathable marl mesh dots
- Seamless design
- Heat-sealed Gymshark logo
- 93% Nylon, 7% Elastane
- Model 1 is 5'8" and wears a size XS
- Model 2 is 5'9" and wears a size L
- SKU: B1A2B-TBBS

* Sizing is based on the first group image
